articles.author: Leah Bitsky
articles.title: Bruce Willis' wife, Emma Heming, 'grateful' for love after aphasia diagnosis - Page Six
articles.description: The actor’s family announced Wednesday that he would be “stepping away” from his career due to the condition, which affects the ability to communicate.
articles.content:
Bruce Willis’ wife, Emma Heming, thanked fans for their outpouring of love after announcing the actor was diagnosed with aphasia.
“your love, support, compassion, prayers really help. I’m grateful. … [+2228 chars]

articles.title: Razzies rescind satirical award poking fun at Bruce Willis following his health disclosure - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actor was nominated eight times for the special category "Worst Performance by Bruce Willis in a 2021 Movie". His family announced earlier this week that he had been diagnosed with aphasia and was retiring.
articles.content: The Razzies on Thursday (Mar 31) rescinded the satirical award they had created poking fun at Bruce Willis for his body of work in 2021 after his family announced he was retiring from acting due to t… [+1729 chars]

articles.title: Police offered to arrest Will Smith, Oscars producer says - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The authorities did not take any action because Chris Rock declined to press charges.

articles.title: What's aphasia, the condition that's led Bruce Willis to retire? - 1News
articles.description: Aphasia is a little-known condition that has many possible causes.
articles.content:
A brain disorder that leads to problems with speaking, reading and writing has sidelined actor Bruce Willis and drawn attention to a little-known condition that has many possible causes.
Bruce Willi… [+1490 chars]

articles.author: Sandra Gonzalez
articles.title: Razzies rescind Bruce Willis award after family reveals actor has aphasia - CNN
articles.description: The Razzies, a tongue-in-cheek award show that hands out honors to the worst cinema of the year, has rescinded its prize for Bruce Willis after the actor's family revealed he is struggling with aphasia, a medical condition that affects his cognitive abilities.
